Articles.Content:
The game itself will start, get to the main loading screen and the load a single part called servomotor, and not load anything else. the text will keep changing above the load bar but nothing happens. using the launcher to set it to fullscreen made no difference, and neither did changing it to not using the 64 bit version. 

Here is the output log:

Edited June 27, 2016 by tinypixel
Narrow down stuff
Possibly, that file is missing. Have you tried reinstalling a fresh copy?
I have reinstalled it twice, and it is always that part that it gets stuck on.

Try keeping the window in focus while KSP loads, this suggests you are alt+tabbing away from KSP.

Quote

[LOG 21:53:10.615] Skipped frame because GfxDevice is in invalid state (device lost)

Also please ensure your graphics drivers are up to date, you may need to reinstall them if Windows is misreporting the driver version.
I am not alt tabbing away, I have tried both windowed and fullscreen and in the native resolution and not in it. Ill try seeing if the drivers need updating.
